item.title: k8s: Spotlight on SIG Architecture: API Governance
item.description:
Interview with Jordan Liggitt describing SIG Architectureâ€™s API Governance subproject: it defines and enforces conventions across Kubernetes API surfaces to balance stability/compatibility with ongoing evolution.

  • Source: Kubernetes Official Blog

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure API Management adds support for A2A Agent APIs
item.description:
Azure API Management now publicly previews support for A2A (agent) APIs. This enables organizations to manage and govern agent APIs alongside AI model APIs, Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools, and traditional APIs.

  • Source: Azure Updates
